about.title: About
about.subtitle: A pan-African platform dedicated to the development, valorization and access to quality seeds to transform African agriculture.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We are here to answer your questions and support you in your journey with AfricaSeeds.

hero.title: Strengthening the African Seed Sector
hero.description: We are committed to creating a sustainable, integrated and effective seed system to support food security, agricultural transformation and farmers' access to quality seeds across Africa.
